name: Dice Court
description:
*Browser players note* If you can not look around with the mouse, press escape then space to recapture the mouse. Also, if the cursor drifts, try fullscreen mode

Welcome to the first day at your new job, kid.

As you know, our casino is a little special, since we allow customers to come with their own dice, because some have, you know, emotional value.. But you see, a lot of wierd folk come to us,  and we want to make sure that no funny business is happening in our casino. So make sure that no cheater gets in, else you'll be unemployed again very soon.

- Your new boss


Game Description:

Put yourself in the shoes of a casino receptionist and decide who gets to come in and who won't. Make use of your tools and your wit and figure who's the cheater, but don't reject honest customers
